Astro: A modern front-end framework for building fast websites.
MDX: An authorable format that lets you seamlessly write JSX in your Markdown documents.
Web App platform: An amazing technology where you can download a website as an Application for your desktop or device's homescreen
PWA: A Progressive Web App (PWA) is a website that can also work offline and behave like a mobile app when added to your device's home screen.
Progressive Web App: A Progressive Web App (PWA) is a website that can also work offline and behave like a mobile app when added to your device's home screen.
Progressive Web Application: Or a Progressive Web App (PWA) is a website that can also work offline and behave like a mobile app when added to your device's home screen.
